info.description: In an accounting workflow, valuations are generated for various processes at the portfolio/portfolio group level. This service can be used to retrieve and filter for accounting valuations data.
info.title: Valuations

get.description: Gets a Valuation for provided valuation_id

post.description:
Filter valuations based on various criteria including portfolios, date range, and more.
 Either valuation id or portfolio ticker/code should be provided. In case both are provided, valuations will be retrieved based on portfolio ticker/code. If valuation id is specified, no need to include other parameters. Otherwise Valuation_id will be ignored
 Process type is required with portfolio code/ticker or else, appropriate exception will be thrown.
 Date range for which valuation is requested should not exceed 366 days. Date range (start_date and end_date) is required unless max record is passed.
 If system analyzes query to be too broad, appropriate exception would be thrown. Below are some guidelines to limit the size of the query -
   a) Keep the date range within 366 days.
   b) Keep the portfolio_ticker/portfolio_code count under 2000 when requesting valuations for a year.
   c) Keep the period short (30 days - 90 days) if the portfolio_ticker/portfolio_code count is more than 2000.

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsTickerExpansionType.description:
- TICKER_EXPANSION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - TICKER_EXPANSION_TYPE_PORT_GROUP: The port group ticker
 - TICKER_EXPANSION_TYPE_REPORTING_GROUP: The reporting group ticker
enumsTickerExpansionType.title: Types of Configuration ticker expansion

query.title: Query used to filter against valuations

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of Valuation to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 100
Valuation will be returned. The maximum value is 100; values
above 100 will be coerced to 100.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'ListValuations' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'ListValuations' must match the call that provided the page
token.

valuations.title: list of Valuations result fetched for given portfolio and for given date_range

nextPageToken.title: describes the next token to get additional results

navLogExceptionRecords.title: A list of exceptions for a nav id

nextPageToken.title: Describes the next token to get additional results

v1Valuation.title: Valuation represents the data of valuation generated by accounting system for portfolio

id.title: Describes the id of the Valuation

navStatus.title: Describes the more specific status of Valuation

benchmarkName.title: Describes the benchmark ticker's name of given ticker

valuationNav.title: Describes the NAV after Valuation generated

startNav.title: Describes the starting nav of Valuation

totalFlow.title: Describes the cashflow in the period

dietzNav.title: Describes the dietz_nav or cashflow weighted nav

totalReturnMtd.title: Describes the portfolio gross return over month to date

totalReturnQtd.title: Describes the portfolio gross return over quarter to date

totalReturnYtd.title: Describes the portfolio gross return over year to date

exceptionCount.title: Describes the count of exception occured while runing valuation

benchmarkPortfolioId.title: Describes the portfolio_id of benchmark ticker

benchmarkTotalReturnMtd.title: Describes the benchmark total return over month to date

benchmarkTotalReturnQtd.title: Describes the benchmark total return over quarter to date

benchmarkTotalReturnYtd.title: Describes the benchmark total return over year to date

benchmarkTotalReturnIncept.title: Describes the benchmark return since inception

admin.title: Describes the admin of the ticker

totalNetReturnManagement.title: Describes the net return of management fees

modifyTime.title: Describes the time at which valuation got modified

valuationCurrencyCode.title: Describes the currency in which Net Asset Value is calculated

publisher.title: Describes the user_id of user who published the Valuation

modifier.title: Describes the user_id of user who modified the valuation

valuationPriceGroup.title: Describes the price hierarchy used in the valuation

navBasis.title: Describes the nav basis used in the valuation

acctBasis.title: Describes the accounting basis used in the valuation

reason.title: Describes the reason used in the valuation

processCode.title: Describes the process code used in the valuation

v1ValuationException.title: ValuationException describes the exception occured while running a valuation for portfolio

exceptionComment.title: Describes the comment given for this exception

exceptionCommentTime.title: Describes the time when the comment was added

assetId.title: Describes the asset id or cusip

exceptionDescription.title: Describes the description of the exception

exceptionStatus.title: Describes the status of the exception

exceptionSubType.title: Describes the subtype of the exception

exceptionType.title: describes the type of the exception

valuationId.title: Describes the valuation id of the exception

navImpact.title: Describes the nav impact of the exception

exceptionPriority.title: Describes the priority of the exception

securityGroup.description: Describes ways to classify a security, identifies if a security is an Equity or a Bond or a Future etc.

securityType.description: Describes ways to classify a security, identifies if a security is GOVT or CORP etc.

source.title: Describes the source of the exception

status.title: Describes the status of the exception

modifier.title: Describes userName of user who modified the status

statusTime.title: Describes the time of the status

valuationDate.title: Describes the value date of the Valuation

v1ValuationQuery.title: The query required to perform a filter query

valuationIds.title:
Valuation_ids for which the valuations to be retrieved.
Maximum 5000 valuations can be retrieved in a batch

portfolioTickers.title: List of tickers to filter Valuations for

processTypes.description:
List of process types to filter Valuations for given portfolio.
See ALPHA_FLAGFINAL decodes table for the values of process types available to be filtered by.

navStatuses.description:
List of nav statuses.
See NAV_STATUS decodes table, use cde values for the nav status available to be filtered by.

sortColumns.title:
Columns on which sort operation has to be performed, along with their sort order.
Format +col1, -col2, col3, where + means ascending and - means descending. If no order is 
mentioned, the default order is ascending.
List of allowed columns: [exceptionCount, navId, fund, valueDate, snapTime, flagFinal, startDate, startSnapTime, status, modifyTime, portfolioName]

portfolioIds.description: List of portofolio codes to filter Valuations for.

workflowStatus.description:
Workflow status to filter the valuations by.
See NAV_STATUS decodes table, use decde values for the workflow status available.

expansionType.description: It is ticker expantion type. It is an optional field.

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
